languages.text: {n}Язвительный смешок Маражая, кажется, режет самый воздух.{/n} "Он рыдал, умоляя меня о смерти".
{n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seems to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."
languages.original_text: {n}Язвительный смешок Маражая, кажется, режет самый воздух.{/n} "Он рыдал, умоляя меня о смерти".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seemed to cut the very air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."
{n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seemed to cut the very air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."
{n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seemed to cut even the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."
{n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seemed to cut even the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."
{n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seemed to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."
{n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seemed to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."

languages.text: {n}Le rire cinglant de Marazhai fend l'air.{/n} « Il pleurait en me suppliant de l'achever. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seems to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire cinglant de Marazhai fend l'air.{/n} « Il pleurait en me suppliant de l'achever. »

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋尖刻的笑声几乎要把空气撕碎。{/n}“他痛哭流涕，乞求我给他个痛快。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seems to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋尖刻的笑声几乎要把空气都割断了。{/n}“他痛哭流涕，乞求我给他个痛快。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの冷たい笑いは空気を切り裂くようだった。{/n}「俺に死を乞うたとき、奴は泣いていたよ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seems to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの冷たい笑いは空気さえも切り裂くようだった。{/n}「俺に死を乞うたとき、奴は泣いていたよ」

languages.text: {n}Marazhais höhnisches Lachen scheint selbst die Luft zu zerschneiden.{/n} "Er weinte, als er um den Tod bettelte."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seems to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais höhnisches Lachen scheint selbst die Luft zu zerschneiden.{/n} "Er weinte, als er um den Tod bettelte."

languages.text: {n}La risa sardónica de Marazhai parece capaz de cortar el aire.{/n} «Sollozaba cuando me suplicó que lo matara».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seems to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."

traits.locale_text: {n}La risa sardónica de Marazhai parece capaz de cortar el aire.{/n} «Sollozaba cuando me suplicó que lo matara».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın iğneleyici kahkahası, sessizliği bölüyor.{/n} "Onu öldüreyim diye yalvarırken ağlıyordu."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's scathing laugh seems to cut through the air.{/n} "He was weeping when he begged me for death."
